title: Workflow Automation with n8n
summary: A 6-session hands-on workshop to master workflow automation using n8n. Learn to build, integrate, and deploy smart automations that connect APIs, databases, and cloud tools—without writing full code.
features: Understand n8n’s core concepts, interface, and workflow structure
Learn to use different triggers, actions, and integrations effectively
Work with APIs, webhooks, and data transformations inside n8n
Implement control flows, conditions, and error handling for robust automations
Integrate external tools and databases securely using credentials and OAuth2
Develop and reuse modular workflows for scalable automation systems
Gain best practices for workflow management, versioning, and deployment
Dec 13 - Dec 28, 2025. Every Saturday & Sunday, 6 PM – 8 PM IST

title: 5-Day GenAI Architecture Workshop
summary: A practical 5-day live workshop to learn how to design, architect, and blueprint production-grade GenAI systems using RAG, LLMOps, and agentic patterns. Perfect for working engineers and tech leads who want clarity and practical skills—without theory overload.
features: Understand the core building blocks of GenAI system design
Learn RAG fundamentals: chunking, embeddings, vector DBs, reranking
Master LLMOps essentials: evaluation, monitoring, guardrails
Explore multi-agent and orchestration patterns
Build production-ready architecture diagrams
Learn deployment considerations: infra, latency, observability, cost
Get architecture templates and design checklists
Mentor feedback on your assignment
Recordings included for lifetime access
Jan 03 - Jan 17, 2026. Every Sat & Sun, 08 AM – 10 AM IST

title: AI Architecture & Agentic Systems (6-Month Live Cohort)
summary: A career-rewriting program to help experienced backend developers transition into AI architects by translating their existing 8–20 years of engineering experience into production-grade AI systems.
features: Translate your backend experience to AI system design using the Architecture Lens Framework
Master 5 Agentic AI design patterns and where each fits in real-world systems
Design 6 production-grade systems including Customer Support AI, Financial Advisory AI, Multi-Agent Flows & more
Deploy 2 full production systems to AWS/GCP and capture live metrics (required for graduation)
Hands-on implementation: pipelines, orchestration, monitoring, observability & cost optimization
Career Velocity Path: LinkedIn positioning, resume reframing, system design interviews & salary negotiation
Start with the 5-Day GenAI Architecture Workshop. Decide later if the 6-month cohort is right for you.
Live every Sat & Sun (8–10 AM IST) + lifetime access to all recordings & community
Next Cohort: Jan 24 – Jul 26, 2026
Cohort Size: Only 30 seats (intentionally selective)

title: AI at Work: From Awareness to Automation
summary: A 10-day live, no-code workshop designed to help professionals across roles confidently use AI at work. Learn how to use ChatGPT, build Custom GPTs, automate repetitive tasks, and understand GenAI concepts like RAG and AI Agents—without coding or technical overload.
features: Understand the AI landscape and how GenAI fits into everyday work
Learn practical prompt engineering frameworks that work across roles
Build Custom GPTs tailored to your job (HR, Product, Finance, Ops, Dev, Support)
Design AI workflows that go beyond one-off prompts
Automate repetitive tasks using no-code workflows with n8n
Understand core concepts of GenAI, RAG, and AI Agents without technical complexity
See real AI automation and agent workflows implemented using no-code tools
Create a personal 30-day AI adoption plan for your role
Feb 2 - Feb 13, 2026. Weekdays only, 7:00 PM – 8:30 PM EST

title: Becoming Creative - 12-Week Workshop
summary: Unlock imagination, overcome creative blocks, and master the art of thinking differently. Perfect for artists, professionals, and anyone seeking fresh inspiration.
features: 24 hours of live instruction
Small cohort (max 30)
Downloadable exercises & worksheets
Lifetime access to recordings
Certificate of completion
